Description:
Got It In One!
Achieving the perfect balance of classical splendor and contemporary style in a glorious native garden setting, this outstanding Edwardian is an inner-city oasis for sublime indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. A flexible three bedroom and study floorplan is beautifully enhanced by pressed metal ceilings and dado, Oak and Kauri pine floors, plantation shutters, ducted heating, air-conditioning and alarm on a secluded landscaped block enjoying fabulous decking and remote-control parking. Walk to Darling Gardens, cafes, shops, schools, Yarra trails and train station from this decorative domain including grand sitting/dining room, family room with wonderful outlook, brilliant gourmet kitchen, marble floor bathroom, laundry/WC, open fireplaces, return veranda and bicycle storage.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271
Insights: 1 Gordon Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Light & Spacious!
An exceptionally spacious floor plan designed to provide abundant natural light sets this fabulous strata apartment ahead of the rest!
Ideally located at the rear of a solid and well maintained block, this first floor apartment features two double bedrooms (both with built-in-robes) generous open plan lounge and dining, separate updated kitchen with great cupboard space, well-appointed bathroom with laundry area, separate toilet, security intercom and covered car space on title. All with Clifton Hill village's exciting attractions are at your doorstep - hectares of Yarra Parkland, kilometers of bike trails, cozy cafes, shops and trains all just moments away.
Both wise investors and occupiers seeking an affordable entry into the prized 3068 residential precinct will want to inspect.
Stefan Dzanovski : 0404 828 723

Description:
Alexander - A Great Opportunity
Instantly appealing and surprisingly spacious this refurbished two bedroom home boasts an outstanding locale a leisurely stroll to Darling Gardens, all transport and freeway access.
Boasting large room sizes and high strapped ceilings it offers a low maintenance lifestyle for weekend freedom.
North facing windows in the spacious lounge create a light filled ambiance, while a quality kitchen and distinct dining area spill out to the landscaped rear garden.
There are two large bedrooms both with generous robes, a chic bathroom, and a separate laundry for convenience.
In a scenic sought after pocket close to the Yarra River and Yarra Bend Park, you are also handy to popular Brunswick and Lygon Street shops, cafes and restaurants, Melbourne University and the city CBD.
Photo ID Required

Description:
A Truly Rare Offering!
This huge 472m2 (approx) allotment with northerly rear aspect is nestled in the heart of one of Clifton Hill's finest streets and provides a wealth of different options. The solid double brick home is well-appointed with updated large kitchen and meals areas and fantastic living spaces, the chance to move right in and enjoy the three bedroom accommodation is very much an option. Others may wish to extend renovate, update or redevelop (STCA). Conveniently positioned abutting Little Walker Lane and just moments from parklands and sports fields, this inner city land holding is a rare find! A short walk to the Clifton Hill Village and transport, a train or tram will have you in the heart of the city in no time. Also comprising, large four car garage with easy access, ducted heating and air-conditioning.
Gary Fitzpatrick : 0437 920 972

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED. SIMPLY MOVE IN AND ENJOY.
Highly prized, and situated just moments from the Darling Gardens, this immaculate two bedroom Victorian home provides the desirable open plan living with rear courtyard garden outlook that so many seek, yet is rarely found at this price point. Comprising arched entry hall, beautiful Victorian lining board ceilings, two bedrooms, (OFP), bright kitchen, refurbished bathroom, and family room opening to the rear courtyard. Only moments from Smith and Brunswick Street restaurant precincts, local gym/pool, and tram/train to the city, your opportunity to enter this prized locale awaits. Situated within the coveted Gold street primary catchment area.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Style, Sophistication & Spirit
An exquisite designer/builder's-own renovation has brilliantly transformed this tuckpointed brick terrace into a sophisticated contemporary domain soaking up sunshine, seclusion and a strong community spirit. Showcasing Wunderlich ceilings, Kauri pine and white sandstone floors, triple-ached hall and oodles of style; the flexible layout of this beautiful home c1889 features two fitted bedrooms, lounge room or third bedroom, living/dining with soaring clean-lined ceiling and bifold doors, stone kitchen with European appliances, marble bathroom/ensuite and concealed laundry. Also offers hydronic heating, air-conditioning, alarm, versatile retreat/office, secluded entertainers' courtyard garden and auto garage. Walk to schools, shops, Darling Gardens and train station.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
UNDER OFFER - Bargain Buying
Whether you're looking for your first home or a conveniently located investment property, this affordable Miners Cottage should be top of your list.
Positioned on a compact allotment, the home consists of two generous bedrooms, central lounge and kitchen/meals area, and rear courtyard..
The property is ideally located in close proximity to Queens Parade, Smith St and Brunswick St shops and cafes, trams, trains, schools, parks and so much more. Currently leased until 30/01/2013 and returning $1,825pcm.
Don't miss this opportunity to buy the cheapest house in Clifton Hill.

Description:
EXCEPTIONALLY SPACIOUS, AND SO WELL LOCATED!
Generously proportioned rooms, a well-designed three bedroom layout and a prime cul de sac position just around the corner from the Darling Gardens give this town residence a very special appeal. A covered entry opens to a wide hallway, from which run a full-size laundry and WC, and a walk-in understair storage area. Set across the rear of the ground level is the kitchen -- well-equipped with quality stainless steel appliances, ample storage and soft-touch drawers – open to a sunny dining room with a wall of glass to the deep north-facing courtyard garden.
To the rear of the central level is the living room, spacious by any standard, with lots of northerly light. A hallway connects it to the main bedroom, a smart bathroom with bath and shower recess, and a separate toilet. Two further double bedrooms, both with high ceilings and storage, and one with stunning views over Clifton Hill to the CBD, occupy the upper level.
Among the many features of this welcoming property are recycled jarrah floorboards, reverse cycle air conditioning and gas heating throughout, abundant storage space, and covered parking adjacent to the entrance. The location could hardly be bettered – at the city end of Clifton Hill, within easy walking distance to tram and train transport, Queens Parade cafes and shopping, and Gold Street Primary School. Don’t miss it!
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Ground Floor Convenience
This wonderfully light and spacious ground floor strata apartment is set in a prized residential precinct with the historic Darling Gardens directly opposite. Trains, trams, the Collingwood Leisure Centre and vibrant Queens Parade shopping area are all just minutes away. Beautifully refurbished accommodation comprises entry hall, living room drawing northerly light and large adjacent kitchen, two bedrooms (both with built-in-robes) and sparkling bathroom with internal laundry facilities plus carport on title. Both investors and first home buyers seeking affordable entry to this coveted location will want to inspect.
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
A little Gem
Sale by Set Date 24/4/2012
Whether you're looking for your first home or a conveniently located investment property, this affordable Miners Cottage should be top of your list.
Positioned on a compact allotment, the home consists of two generous bedrooms with open fire places, central lounge and kitchen/meals area also with an open fireplace, and rear courtyard. Features include, reverse cycle air-conditioning, polished floors throughout and ROW.
The property is ideally located in close proximity to Queens Parade, Smith St and Brunswick St shops and cafes, trams, trains, schools, parks and so much more. Don't miss this opportunity to secure your very own piece of Clifton Hill.

Description:
SO MUCH POTENTIAL, SO MUCH LAND
What an opportunity! Overlooking Yarra parkland in Clifton Hill’s finest street, this sprawling 1920s residence offers exciting potential for renovation or redevelopment (STCA) into one of the area’s finest homes. The allotment is remarkably large -- 708m2 approx – with the bonus of a second street frontage to Clifton Street at the rear (planning approval for second residence and subdivision). The free standing timber residence, in sound original condition, includes four very large bedrooms, a spacious sitting room, plus functional kitchen/meals and bathroom. Leadlights and other period detail are intact. Spensley St Primary, playing fields and cafes are within easy walking distance.

Description:
GLEAMING RENOVATION, GREAT ADDRESS
A brand-new restyling, streams of northerly light, and a Clifton Village hub location give this wide pediment terrace winning appeal! A classic floor plan offers two large bedrooms (both with quality built-in wardrobes) from an arched timber hallway opening out to a vast living and dining area and kitchen, equipped with stainless steel appliances, soft-touch drawers and Caesarstone benchtops. The focus of the living zone, which has tall north-facing windows, is a timber-mantelled fireplace with gas log fire. To the rear are a porcelain-tiled bathroom and a separate laundry, opening to a courtyard with secure remote parking for two cars.
Features of this appealing house include Tasmanian oak floors, ornate plaster mouldings and quality fittings. Its location is ideal – just around the corner from Clifton Hill station and cafes, and close to Queens Parade, schools and Yarra Parkland.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
A GREAT START, A TOP ADDRESS!
This light-filled period residence (ca 1919), in sound refurbished condition, has exciting potential for further renovation and extension (STCA) in the quiet central section of this popular street, so close to Yarra Parkland, city train, primary school and Clifton Hill Village.
An entry porch with fretwork arch opens to a hallway floored in polished timber, leading to two spacious bedrooms - the main with a bay window looking over the neat cottage garden, both with walls of quality built-in wardrobes. The well-proportioned living and dining room is equipped with a Cannon gas log fire. To the rear of the house are a functional modern kitchen, a newly fitted bathroom with timber cabinetry, a sunroom, laundry and separate WC. The landscaped north-facing garden, shaded by a mature magnolia, contains an intriguing relic of the area's history - a neat gabled workshop/utility room, one of several erected in O'Grady Street during World War II to provide accommodation for servicemen on leave.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
FOUR BEDROOM ACCOMODATION
Situated on the high of the hill, conveniently opposite the Clifton Hill station, this 4 bedroom Victorian home is currently leased to a long standing tenant. Retaining many of its uniquely Victorian features such as ceiling roses, deep cornices, and attractive lace work, this double-storey terrace offers excellent accommodation close to the Village and Queen\\\\\\\'s Parade shops, Yarra River parklands, city transport, and schools. It comprises 4 bedrooms (2 up, 2 down), 2 bathrooms (1up, 1 down), well-equipped kitchen including meals area, and a spacious upstairs lounge (OFP) with 2 sets of double doors opening onto a balcony. Currently returning $2042 pcm. Sold with either vacant possession or continuance of the existing lease.

Description:
High Calibre Lifestyle Haven
The complete inner-city lifestyle is now yours with this brand new designer townhouse where it all comes brilliantly together under the one roof - living, entertaining and working! Enjoying pride of place with a striking, sun-drenched contemporary profile heading an attractive village-style row, this stunning multi-level domain is conveniently located minutes to the CBD and moments to Yarra River trails, cafes, shops and train station. Auto garage (internal) and courtyard entry to a versatile home office/studio or third bedroom space complement a fabulous floorplan of main entrance, two double bedrooms with built-in-robes and ensuites, living and dining areas opening to two big balconies, streamlined Miele stone kitchen, third bathroom, laundry area, heating/cooling and polished floorboards. A savvy investment and work from home opportunity!
Enter via Noone Street.
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769

Description:
Offering so much!
Within the delightful environs of Clifton Hill only a short stroll to the renowned ‘village’ cafe strip, acres of Yarra parkland/sporting fields and a multitude of public transport options is this tastefully renovated upper floor apartment enjoying a beautiful light filled demeanour and panoramic 270 degree views to the North, East and South (Including a picture perfect view of the CBD!).
Part of a well maintained complex featuring security intercom entry, undercover car parking and a pro-active owner’s corporation the apartment would make an ideal ongoing investment or a superb first purchase sure to not only enhance your lifestyle but also your future wealth... Features include 2 very large bedrooms with built in robes, gorgeous kitchen with a view to savour whilst you complete domestic duties, spacious living room with northern orientation, updated bathroom with laundry facilities, separate toilet, floating timber floor and quality fittings throughout.
Insights: 5/41 Fenwick Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
WAREHOUSE CHARISMA
Conveniently located warehouse dwelling situated in the very heart of Clifton Hill with immediate access to city train, acres of Parkland, restaurants and shops. Highly finished to provide low maintenance living, from its soaring ceilings, with original steel beams, to its sleek timber and tiled floors, this home is a sanctuary of peace and calm. Comprises 2 bedrooms (BIRs), dining, central living zone filled with Northern natural light, elegant kitchen, bathroom with luxurious walk-in shower, concealed laundry, and storage room with convenient roll-a-door access to a communal car park.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
HUGE PRICE REDUCTION!! - WAREHOUSE SHELL IN THE HEART OF CLIFTON HILL
Part of the landmark Staggs Gloves factory, this spacious warehouse space offers an exciting opportunity for value-adding renovation in a sought-after precinct close to Yarra Parklands, Clifton Hill Station and Queens Parade cafes. The current fit out consists of lower level with generous living and dining area with open timber-finished kitchen; additional living space is provided by a courtyard with roller-door car access from Spensley Street. Also on the ground floor are a laundry and powder room. Upstairs are two large loft-style bedrooms and a bathroom. This distinctive property features timber, mellow brick and wrought iron finishes, and the original industrial windows ensure year-round natural light. Don’t miss it!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
